actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend title VII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to provide a program to prevent discrimination on account of the handicapped condition of an individual.
short_title: Handicapped Condition Antidiscrimination in Employment Act

summary.text: Handicapped Condition Antidiscrimination in Employment Act - Amends the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to include as an unlawful employment practice discrimination on the basis of handicap. Permits consideration of a handicapped condition (1) where the health of the handicapped individual or fellow employees may be endangered and (2) with respect to employee benefit plans.

titles.title: Handicapped Condition Antidiscrimination in Employment Act
A bill to amend title VII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to provide a program to prevent discrimination on account of the handicapped condition of an individual.
